mapper.delete:
delete from factorymanage where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: /**查询全部可用数据*/ select * from factorymanage

select * from factorymanage A where
A.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

select * from factorymanage A where
A.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND A.company like CONCAT('%',#{company},'%')

select * from factorymanage A where
A.company like CONCAT('%',#{company},'%')

select * from factorymanage A where
A.code like CONCAT('%',#{spare01},'%')
or A.address like CONCAT('%',#{spare01},'%')
or A.contact like CONCAT('%',#{spare01},'%')
or A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{spare01},'%')
or A.remark like CONCAT('%',#{spare01},'%')
select address from factorymanage where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select detailed_address from factorymanage where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
